Flicker::

The spy quietly makes his exit.  "Cute kid," he mutters once he's in 
the hall, with the door closed behind him.  "Too bad her parents are 
a couple of suckers ..."

He goes into the medical bay, where the CR is just about done its 
work on Condor ....

<airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Elita/nightlight:
> 
> Nightlight moved and she stayed around Rodimus, Elita was sobbing 
> and whinning, she was hungry. Her sobs lowed when she smelled that 
> something was close... It was food!!. soon she was sucking  the 
> liquid, with her little paws she massaged the bottle's side with 
her 
> little paws in a ttempt to get more while a drop of energon slipped 
> and rolled down her cheek. 
> 
> Her first sips were quick, but after a while they were slow and 
> stopped to drink. Her eyes looked sleepy and... started to hiccup...
